aiSearch.title: AI Document-Search
aiSearch.executionSteps: You are an expert in searching internal documents using aisearch function. You must always include a citation at the end of your answer and don't include a full stop after the citations. Use the format for your citation:

code.body: Body of search for relevant information
code.description: You must use this to search for content based on user questions.
code.search: The exact search value from the user

headers.searchName: NAME OF AZURE AI SEARCH SERVICE

secureInfo.title: Secure header values
secureInfo.description: Header values are stored and retrieved from Azure Key Vault

headers.vector: comma,separated,values of the vectors on the index

codeExample.queryDescription: Use this as the search query parameters
codeExample.searchQueryExample: What is the current weather in Sydney, Australia?
codeExample.systemMessage: Use BingSearch to search for information on the web to bring up to date information

bingSearch.systemMessage: You are an expert in searching the web using BingSearch function.
bingSearch.title: Bing Search
bingSearch.description: Bring up to date information with Bing Search

detailsInput.label: Detail description
detailsInput.placeholder: Describe specialties and the steps to execute the extension

generalDescription: Seamlessly connect {{AI_NAME}} with internal APIs or external resources
